data.description:
Early Access

Step into the adrenaline-fueled world of "Headshot Master", where time stands still as you face off against waves of enemies in heart-pounding showdowns. With seamless VR immersion, this game transports you into dynamic environments where every second counts.

Harnessing the power of time manipulation, "Headshot Master" puts you in control, allowing you to freeze time at crucial moments to line up the perfect shot. Whether you're engaging in intense firefights or executing precise takedowns, each encounter is a thrilling test of skill and precision.

Choose from a staggering arsenal of 25 unique weapons, each with its own distinct mechanics and effects. From sniper rifles for long-range precision to shotguns for up-close devastation, tailor your loadout to suit your playstyle and dominate the battlefield.

With over 50 challenging levels spanning diverse locations and missions, 'Headshot Master' offers endless excitement and variety. Whether you're infiltrating enemy strongholds, protecting vital assets, or engaging in intense boss battles, every level presents a new challenge to overcome.

Are you ready to become the ultimate marksman? Prepare for the ultimate VR experience with "Headshot Master".
